content: {"name": "Bergen County Division of Senior Services / North Arlington Senior Activity Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Closed for Sit Down Meals, but can\narrange pick up or delivery for meals.\nPlease call for more information. ", "email": "", "url": "https://www.co.bergen.nj.us/division-of-senior-services/senior-activity-centers", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "11 York Road", "address_2": null, "city": "North Arlington", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07031", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.7886045, "longitude": -74.1357865}, "phones": [{"number": "(201) 998-5636", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "17:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A donation of $1.25 is accepted for each meal"}]}
